resources.string: Please note that you are attempting to cancel your account. Once the cancellation is completed, the account will no longer be usable and cannot be undone. Proceed with caution and ensure that you have backed up, transferred, or saved all important information and data related to this account. If you confirm the cancellation, please proceed with the operation. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!
Please agree to the privacy policy and user agreement first!
I have read and agree to the [privacy policy](https://api.funnysaltyfish.fun/trans/v1/api/privacy) and [user agreement](https://api.funnysaltyfish.fun/trans/v1/api/user_agreement)
Your Android version is too low to support fingerprint authentication! Password authentication will be used instead~
Failed to set up fingerprint for unknown reasons. Please use password instead!
8–16 characters, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and numbers
You can change your username once every 30 days. The next available modification date is
Found %1$s accounts associated with this email
Please enter a valid mainstream email
Please enter the received verification code
Failed to send verification code, unknown error!
Login failed, user information returned is empty!
The current username is different from the username set when setting up fingerprint authentication. Please set up fingerprint authentication again.
Failed to reset password, unknown error!
Optional, both parties can receive VIP if success
